creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: quilted coat with purple, yellow white and red ikat patterning; coat is open in front; sleeves extend straight out from shoulders; red and grey paisley patterned fabric lines inside of coat; green, blue, and white stripe cloth lines inside of coat's bottom; red and yellow stripe cloth lines inside of coat's sleeve cuffs
title: Quilted coat
